body: version: ${1:1.10}  # Required  # The Go version to download (if necessary) and use. Example: 1.9.3
#goPath:  # Optional  # A custom value for the GOPATH environment variable.
#goBin:  # Optional  # A custom value for the GOBIN environment variable.
Go tool installer.description: Find in cache or download a specific version of Go and add it to the PATH
